scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run images && npm run favicons && npm run index && npm run tos && npm run privacy && npm run sass
scripts.index: mustache -p src/html/header.mustache -p src/html/footer.mustache src/data/production.json src/html/index.mustache > docs/index.html
scripts.tos: mustache -p src/html/header.mustache -p src/html/footer.mustache src/data/production.json src/html/tos.mustache > docs/tos.html && mkdir docs/tos && cp docs/tos.html docs/tos/index.html
scripts.privacy: mustache -p src/html/header.mustache -p src/html/footer.mustache src/data/production.json src/html/privacy.mustache > docs/privacy.html && mkdir docs/privacy && cp docs/privacy.html docs/privacy/index.html
